verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
When You think of me
When You hear my name
When You see my face
Let it be mercy

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: When thoughts of me come to Your memory

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Oh my story told
Let it be mercy

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: Don't remember me according to my sin

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
But remember me with compassion
When my voice is heard around Your throne
Let it strike Your heart with love alone

verse.name: v6
verse.lines:
When You think of me
When You hear my name

Let it be mercy

verse.name: v7
verse.lines: When thoughts of me come to Your memory

verse.name: v8
verse.lines:

verse.name: v9
verse.lines: When I stand face to face and look You in the eyes

verse.name: v10
verse.lines:
See my heart, see my soul and how I fought the fight
Blot out my sin when You look at me
Let my life be a treasured memory
